QuestData.Title: Terror of the Dread Wastes
QuestData.Description: That thing is huge!$B$BThe Shado-Pan holding the battlefront were never trained for something like this... let's get down there and take it out ourselves.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Norvakess, the Terror of the Dread Wastes.
QuestData.RewardText: You. You're coming with me.$B$BI've never seen someone handle themselves on the battlefield like that. I need a strong $c like you with me when we face the Sha of Hatred.
